channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Pope Leo visits iconic Blue Mosque on second day of his trip to Turkey
item.description: Pope Leo XIV has visited Istanbul’s Blue Mosque, emphasizing Christian unity during his trip to Turkey

item.title: Shopping mall shooting wounds 2, prompts Black Friday evacuation in the Bay Area
item.description: Police in California evacuated a shopping mall on one of the busiest shopping days of the year after a shooting left two people with gunshot wounds

item.title: Snow, rain and cold in store for some Thanksgiving travelers
item.description: Snow and chilly temperatures have already greeted some Thanksgiving travelers and plenty more could be on its way this holiday weekend

item.title: Airlines work to fix software glitch on A320 aircraft and some flights are disrupted
item.description: Airlines around the world canceled and delayed flights heading into the weekend to fix software on a widely used commercial plane after an analysis fo...

item.title: Winning numbers drawn in Friday’s Mega Millions
item.description: The winning numbers in Friday evening’s drawing of the "Mega Millions" game were: 06-07-13-39-48, Mega Ball: 4, Megaplier:
